trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> class encapsulates a node or object in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> encapsula um nó ou um objeto na hierarquia do Active Directory Domain Services.

trans-unit.source: Use this class for binding to objects, or reading and updating attributes.
trans-unit.target: Use esta classe para associar aos objetos, ou ler e atualizar atributos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>, along with helper classes, provides support for life-cycle management and navigation methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>, juntamente com as classes auxiliares, fornece suporte para o ciclo de vida de métodos de gerenciamento e navegação.

trans-unit.source: These include creating, deleting, renaming, moving a child node, and enumerating children.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui criar, excluir, renomear, mover um nó filho e enumeração de filhos.

trans-unit.source: After you modify a node, you must commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree.
trans-unit.target: Depois de modificar um nó, você deve confirmar suas alterações para que eles sejam salvos à árvore.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a propriedade <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> can be used to access regular entries and some, but not all, information from schema entries.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> pode ser usado para acessar entradas regulares e alguns, mas não todas, informações de entradas de esquema.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy contains up to several thousand nodes.
trans-unit.target: A hierarquia do Active Directory Domain Services contém até vários milhares de nós.

trans-unit.source: Each node represents an object, such as a network printer or a user in a domain.
trans-unit.target: Cada nó representa um objeto, como uma impressora de rede ou um usuário em um domínio.

trans-unit.source: Corporate networks constantly change as new employees are hired and objects such as network printers and computers are added.
trans-unit.target: Redes corporativas constantemente alterar como os novos funcionários contratados e objetos, como computadores e impressoras de rede são adicionados.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) technology provides ways to programmatically add these objects to the directory tree.
trans-unit.target: Tecnologia do Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) fornece maneiras de adicionar esses objetos programaticamente a árvore de diretório.

trans-unit.source: To create a directory entry in the hierarchy, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma entrada de diretório na hierarquia, use o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> property is a collection that provides an <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> method, through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> propriedade é uma coleção que fornece um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> método, por meio do qual você adicionar um nó à coleção diretamente abaixo do nó pai que você está vinculado à.

trans-unit.source: When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar um nó à coleção, você deve especificar um nome para o novo nó e o nome de um modelo de esquema que você deseja associar com o nó.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você talvez queira usar um esquema denominado "Computador" para adicionar novos computadores na hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: This class also contains attribute caching, which can be useful for optimizing network traffic.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe também contém atributos de cache, o que pode ser útil para otimizar o tráfego de rede.

trans-unit.source: To use attribute caching, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o cache de atributo, consulte o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The classes associated with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> component can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers.
trans-unit.target: As classes associadas a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> componente pode ser usado com nenhum dos provedores de serviço de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Some of the current providers are Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT.
trans-unit.target: Alguns dos provedores atuais são WinNT, LDAP Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS) e serviços de informações da Internet (IIS).

trans-unit.source: It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using this class.
trans-unit.target: Presume-se que você tenha uma compreensão geral dos serviços de domínio Active Directory antes de usar essa classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=nameWithType> visão geral do namespace.

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que é associada ao objeto especificado nativo do Active Directory Domain Services.

trans-unit.source: This constructor enables a program to use the methods and properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class on a native Active Directory Domain Services object that implements the IADs interface through a native API.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor permite usar os métodos e propriedades de um programa de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> classe em um objeto do Active Directory Domain Services nativo que implementa a interface IADs por meio de uma API nativa.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a interface IADs, consulte o tópico [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) na biblioteca MSDN em [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The path at which to bind the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.#ctor(System.String)" /> to the directory.
trans-unit.target: O caminho no qual o <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.#ctor(System.String)" /> será associado ao diretório.

trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path" /> é inicializada com esse valor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> class that binds this instance to the node in Active Directory Domain Services located at the specified path.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que associa essa instância ao nó no Active Directory Domain Services localizado no caminho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example binds a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object to the directory entry at the specified path, and displays the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> property of each child entry that is specified by the node's <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir associa um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> o objeto para a entrada de diretório no caminho especificado e exibe o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> propriedade de cada entrada filho especificado ao nó <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path" /> é inicializada com esse valor.

trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username" /> é inicializada com esse valor.

trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes" />.

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of authentication to use.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de autenticação a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes" />.

trans-unit.source: Prior to [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the default value is <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes.None>.
trans-unit.target: Antes de [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], o valor padrão é <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes.None>.

trans-unit.source: Beginning with [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the default value is <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes.Secure>.
trans-unit.target: Começando com [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], o valor padrão é <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes.Secure>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as entradas filhas deste nó na hierarquia do Active Directory Domain Services.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries" /> object containing the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries" /> que contém as entradas filhas deste nó na hierarquia do Active Directory Domain Services.

trans-unit.source: The child entries are only the immediate children of this node.
trans-unit.target: As entradas filho são apenas os filhos imediatos desse nó.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to find, retrieve, or create a directory entry in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para localizar, recuperar ou criar uma entrada de diretório na hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: This property is a collection that, along with the usual iteration capabilities, provides an <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> method through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é uma coleção que, juntamente com os recursos de interação comum, fornece um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> método por meio do qual você adicionar um nó à coleção diretamente abaixo do nó pai que você está vinculado à.

trans-unit.source: When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar um nó à coleção, você deve especificar um nome para o novo nó e o nome de um modelo de esquema que você deseja associar com o nó.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você talvez queira usar um esquema denominado "Computador" para adicionar novos computadores na hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: By default, changes are made locally to a cache.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, as alterações são feitas localmente em um cache.

trans-unit.source: After you modify or add a node, you must call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method to commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree.
trans-unit.target: Depois de modificar ou adicionar um nó, você deve chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> método para confirmar as alterações para que eles sejam salvos à árvore.

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache> before calling <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Se você chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache> antes de chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, quaisquer alterações não confirmadas para o cache de propriedades serão perdidas.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache> methods, and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache> métodos e o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the child entries.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar as entradas filho.

trans-unit.source: Closes the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object and releases any system resources that are associated with this component.
trans-unit.target: Fecha o objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> e libera todos os recursos do sistema que estão associados a esse componente.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to release unmanaged system resources, without waiting for garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método para liberar recursos não gerenciados do sistema, sem aguardar a coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Following a call to <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Close%2A>, any operations on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> might raise exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Após uma chamada para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Close%2A>, operações de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> pode gerar exceções.

trans-unit.source: Saves changes that are made to a directory entry to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Salva as alterações feitas em uma entrada de diretório no repositório de diretórios subjacente.

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, as alterações nas propriedades são feitas localmente em um cache e valores de propriedade a ser lido são armazenados em cache depois de ler o primeiro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the cache include changes to the properties as well as calls to <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> (if this is the newly created entry).
trans-unit.target: As alterações feitas ao cache incluem alterações nas propriedades, bem como chamadas para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> (se esta for a entrada recém-criada).

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> before calling <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Se você chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> antes de chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, quaisquer alterações não confirmadas para o cache de propriedades serão perdidas.

trans-unit.source: Security
trans-unit.target: Segurança

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission> class for reading, writing, deleting, changing, and adding to the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission> classe para ler, gravar, excluir, alterar e adicionar à hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess>.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess>.

trans-unit.source: To commit the changes.
trans-unit.target: Para confirmar as alterações.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this entry.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia dessa entrada.

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that will be the parent for the copy that is being created.
trans-unit.target: O nome diferenciado do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que será o pai para a cópia que está sendo criada.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this entry as a child of the specified parent.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia desta entrada como um filho do pai especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the copy of this entry as a child of the new parent.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que representa a cópia desta entrada como um filho do novo pai.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> on the new object to make the copy permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> é `true`, chame <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> no novo objeto para fazer a cópia permanente.

trans-unit.source: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider does not currently support the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CopyTo%28System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry%29> method.
trans-unit.target: O provedor Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) atualmente não dá suporte a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CopyTo%28System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry%29> método.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> is not a container.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> especificado não é um contêiner.

trans-unit.source: To make a copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer uma cópia do <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The DN of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that will be the parent for the copy that is being created.
trans-unit.target: O DN do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que será o pai para a cópia que está sendo criada.

trans-unit.source: The name of the copy of this entry.
trans-unit.target: O nome da cópia desta entrada.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object, as a child of the specified parent <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object, with the specified new name.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia deste objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />, como um filho do objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> pai especificado, com o novo nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: A renamed copy of this entry as a child of the specified parent.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia renomeada desta entrada como um filho do pai especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider does not currently support this method.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente não há suporte para esse método no provedor Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP).

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> on the new object to make the copy permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> é `true`, chame <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> no novo objeto para fazer a cópia permanente.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object is not a container.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> especificado não é um contêiner.

trans-unit.source: To make a copy of the entry.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer uma cópia da entrada.

trans-unit.source: Deletes this entry and its entire subtree from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Exclui essa entrada e sua subárvore inteira da hierarquia do Active Directory Domain Services.

trans-unit.source: Of the Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) system-supplied providers, only the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) currently supports this operation.
trans-unit.target: Dos provedores de fornecido pelo sistema do Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI), somente o acesso de protocolo LDAP (Lightweight Directory) atualmente oferece suporte a esta operação.

trans-unit.source: The entry and its entire subtree are deleted from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: A entrada e sua subárvore inteira são excluídos da hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Security
trans-unit.target: Segurança

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission> for deleting entries from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission> para excluir entradas da hierarquia de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> is not a container.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> especificado não é um contêiner.

trans-unit.source: To delete the entry and its children.
trans-unit.target: Para excluir a entrada e seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: Descarta os recursos (exceto a memória) usados pelo <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Dispose%2A> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> invoca o método <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Dispose%2A> protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos que são mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> referências de objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods, see [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> métodos, consulte [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, tome cuidado para não referenciar objetos que tenham sido descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified path represents an actual entry in the directory service.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o caminho especificado representa uma entrada real no serviço de diretório.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified path represents a valid entry in the directory service; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o caminho especificado representa uma entrada válida no serviço de diretório, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: Move este <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method on the new object to make the move permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> é `true`, chame o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> método no novo objeto para fazer a mudança permanentes.

trans-unit.target: Para mover a entrada.

trans-unit.target: O pai para o qual você deseja mover esta entrada.

trans-unit.target: O novo nome da entrada.

trans-unit.target: Move este objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> para o pai especificado e altera seu nome para o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> on the new object to make the move permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> é `true`, chame <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> no novo objeto para fazer a mudança permanentes.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do objeto conforme nomeado com o serviço de diretório subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The name of the object as named with the underlying directory service.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto conforme nomeado com o serviço de diretório subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This name, along with <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A>, distinguishes this entry from its siblings and must be unique among its siblings in each container.
trans-unit.target: Esse nome, juntamente com <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A>, distingue essa entrada de seus irmãos e deve ser exclusivo entre seus irmãos em cada contêiner.

trans-unit.target: Para obter o nome.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o GUID da <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />, conforme retornado pelo provedor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that represents the GUID of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />, as returned from the provider.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que representa o GUID da <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />, conforme retornado pelo provedor.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.NativeGuid%2A> property when binding an object in Active Directory Domain Services.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.NativeGuid%2A> propriedade ao associar um objeto nos serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider returns the globally unique identifier of a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> in a different format than the Internet Information Services (IIS), Novell NetWare Directory Server (NDS), and WinNT providers.
trans-unit.target: O provedor LDAP Lightweight Directory Access Protocol () retorna o identificador global exclusivo de um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> em um formato diferente que o Internet Information Services (IIS), Novell Directory Server (NDS do NetWare) e provedores de WinNT.

trans-unit.source: Gets the native Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto nativo das ADSI (Active Directory Service Interfaces).

trans-unit.source: The native ADSI object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto nativo da ADSI.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to cast the native Active Directory Domain Services object, which implements the IADs interface, when you want to use a COM interface.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para converter o objeto nativo de serviços de domínio do Active Directory, que implementa a interface IADs, quando você deseja usar uma interface COM.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a interface IADs, consulte o tópico [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) na biblioteca MSDN em [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp).

trans-unit.source: This object is for advanced scenarios that cannot be accomplished with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=nameWithType> classes alone.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto é para cenários avançados que não podem ser obtidos com o <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=nameWithType> classes sozinho.

trans-unit.source: To use it, you need to import one of the COM interfaces from the IADs family, then cast this property to that interface.
trans-unit.target: Para usá-lo, você precisa importar uma das interfaces de COM da família IADs, em seguida, converta essa propriedade para essa interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the security descriptor for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o descritor de segurança para esta entrada.

trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> que representa o descritor de segurança para essa entrada de diretório.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" /> is performed when an application sets the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.ObjectSecurity" /> property, if the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" /> ocorre quando um aplicativo define a <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.ObjectSecurity" /> propriedade, se o <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache" /> é de propriedade <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: Obtém as opções específicas do provedor para esta entrada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntryConfiguration" /> object that contains the provider-specific options for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntryConfiguration" /> que contém as opções específicas do provedor para esta entrada.

trans-unit.source: To get the options.
trans-unit.target: Para obter as opções.

trans-unit.source: Gets this entry's parent in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o pai da entrada na hierarquia do Active Directory Domain Services.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the parent of this entry.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que representa o pai desta entrada.

trans-unit.source: The following example searches a given <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> and displays the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Parent%2A> of the result.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo seguinte pesquisa uma determinada <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> e exibe o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Parent%2A> do resultado.

trans-unit.source: To get the parent.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o pai.

trans-unit.source: Sets the password to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: Define a senha a ser usada na autenticação do cliente.

trans-unit.source: The password to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: A senha a ser usada na autenticação do cliente.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A> properties to specify alternate credentials with which to access the information in Active Directory Domain Services.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A> propriedades para especificar credenciais alternativas que acessa as informações nos serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Any other <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objects retrieved from this instance (for example, through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) are automatically created with the same alternate credentials.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer outro <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objetos recuperados dessa instância (por exemplo, por meio de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) são criados automaticamente com as mesmas credenciais alternativas.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A> properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A> propriedades da <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example gets the user-specified <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> of all its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo obtém o usuário especificado <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> de todos os seus <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho deste <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.

trans-unit.source: The path of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O caminho deste objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> property uniquely identifies this entry in a networked environment.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> propriedade identifica exclusivamente essa entrada em um ambiente de rede.

trans-unit.source: This entry can always be retrieved using this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa entrada sempre pode ser recuperada usando esse <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> retrieves a new entry from the directory store; it does not change the path of the currently bound entry.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> recupera uma nova entrada do diretório armazenar; ele não altera o caminho da entrada associada atualmente.

trans-unit.source: The classes associated with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> component can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers.
trans-unit.target: As classes associadas a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> componente pode ser usado com nenhum dos provedores de serviço de serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Some of the current providers are Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT.
trans-unit.target: Alguns dos provedores atuais são WinNT, LDAP Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS) e serviços de informações da Internet (IIS).

trans-unit.source: The section of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> that identifies the provider (precedes "://") is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: A seção de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> que identifica o provedor ("://" precede) diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: For example, "LDAP://" or "WinNT://".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, "LDAP: / /" ou "WinNT: / /".

trans-unit.source: The syntax for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> property varies according to the provider.
trans-unit.target: A sintaxe para a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> propriedade varia de acordo com o provedor.

trans-unit.source: Some common scenarios are:
trans-unit.target: Alguns cenários comuns são:

trans-unit.source: WinNT
trans-unit.target: WinNT

trans-unit.source: Connect to a group on a computer.
trans-unit.target: Conecte-se a um grupo em um computador.

trans-unit.source: For example, "WinNT**://\<domain name>/\<computer name>/\<group name>**".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, "WinNT**://\<nome de domínio > /\<nome do computador > /\<nome do grupo >**".

trans-unit.source: If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\<computer name>/\<group name>**".
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver se conectando a um computador local, "WinNT: / /**\<nome do computador > /\<nome do grupo >**".

trans-unit.source: Connect to a user on a computer.
trans-unit.target: Conecte-se a um usuário em um computador.

trans-unit.source: For example, "WinNT://**\<domain name>/\<computer name>/\<user name>**".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, "WinNT: / /**\<nome de domínio > /\<nome do computador > /\<nome de usuário >**".

trans-unit.source: If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\<computer name>/\<user name>**".
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver se conectando a um computador local, "WinNT: / /**\<nome do computador > /\<nome de usuário >**".

trans-unit.source: Connect to services on a computer.
trans-unit.target: Conecte-se aos serviços em um computador.

trans-unit.source: For example, "WinNT://**\<domain name>/\<computer name>/\<service name>**".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, "WinNT: / /**\<nome de domínio > /\<nome do computador > /\<nome do serviço >**".

trans-unit.source: If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\<computer name>/\<service name>**".
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver se conectando a um computador local, "WinNT: / /**\<nome do computador > /\<nome do serviço >**".

trans-unit.source: Discover all domains on the network.
trans-unit.target: Descobrir todos os domínios na rede.

trans-unit.source: For example, "WinNT:" The domains can be found by enumerating the children of this entry.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, "WinNT:" os domínios podem ser encontrados, enumerando os filhos desta entrada.

trans-unit.source: LDAP
trans-unit.target: LDAP

trans-unit.source: Connect to a group in a domain.
trans-unit.target: Conecte-se a um grupo em um domínio.

trans-unit.source: For example, "LDAP://CN=\<group name>, CN =\<Users>, DC=\<domain component>, DC=\<domain component>,...".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, "LDAP://CN =\<nome do grupo >, CN =\<usuários >, DC =\<componente do domínio >, DC =\<componente do domínio >,...".

trans-unit.source: Connect to a user in a domain.
trans-unit.target: Conecte-se a um usuário em um domínio.

trans-unit.source: For example, "LDAP://CN=\<full user name>, CN=\<Users>, DC=\<domain component>, DC=\<domain component>,...".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, "LDAP://CN =\<nome de usuário completo >, CN =\<usuários >, DC =\<componente do domínio >, DC =\<componente do domínio >,...".

trans-unit.source: Connect to computers in a domain.
trans-unit.target: Conecte-se a computadores em um domínio.

trans-unit.source: For example, "LDAP://CN=\<computer name>, CN=\<Computers>, DC=\<domain component>, DC=\<domain component>,...".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, "LDAP://CN =\<nome do computador >, CN =\<computadores >, DC =\<componente do domínio >, DC =\<componente do domínio >,...".

trans-unit.source: IIS
trans-unit.target: IIS

trans-unit.source: Connect to a Web directory.
trans-unit.target: Conecte-se a um diretório da Web.

trans-unit.source: For example, "IIS://LocalHost/W3SVC/1/ROOT/\<Web directory name>".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, "IIS://LocalHost/W3SVC/1/ROOT/\<nome do diretório da Web >".

trans-unit.source: To bind to the current domain using LDAP, use the path "LDAP://RootDSE", then get the default naming context and rebind the entry.
trans-unit.target: Para vincular o domínio atual usando o LDAP, use o caminho "LDAP://RootDSE", em seguida, obter o contexto de nomenclatura padrão e associar novamente a entrada.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo:

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the documentation for your provider and the topic [Using Active Directory Service Interfaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/using_adsi.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a documentação do seu provedor e o tópico [usando Interfaces do serviço Active Directory](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/using_adsi.asp) na biblioteca MSDN em [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: Gets the Active Directory Domain Services properties for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as propriedades do Active Directory Domain Services para esse objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyCollection" /> object that contains the properties that are set on this entry.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.PropertyCollection" /> que contém as propriedades que são definidas nesta entrada.

trans-unit.source: If the property is not initialized, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> calls the ADSI interface [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) method to retrieve the value from the cache.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade não for inicializada, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> chama a interface ADSI [IADs:: Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) método para recuperar o valor do cache.

trans-unit.source: If the underling cache has not been loaded, [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) implicitly calls [IADs::GetInfo](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746349.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Se o cache subjacente não tenha sido carregado, [IADs:: Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) chama implicitamente [IADs::GetInfo](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746349.aspx).

trans-unit.source: This method loads the values of the supported properties that have not been set in the cache from the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Esse método carrega os valores das propriedades com suporte que não foram definidas no cache do armazenamento de diretório base.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> retrieves the property values in the cache only.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas subsequentes para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> recupera os valores de propriedade somente no cache.

trans-unit.source: To control property cache loading, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar o carregamento do cache de propriedades, chame <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>.

trans-unit.source: **Note** The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> property is not supported for use with the Active Directory Client Extension (DSClient) for [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/includes/winnt4family-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: **Observação** o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> propriedade não tem suporte para uso com a extensão de cliente Active Directory (DSClient) para [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/includes/winnt4family-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the properties.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar as propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Loads the property values for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object into the property cache.
trans-unit.target: Carrega os valores da propriedade para esse objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> no cache de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Loads the property values for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object into the property cache.
trans-unit.target: Carrega os valores da propriedade para esse objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> no cache de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer alterações não confirmadas para o cache de propriedade serão perdidas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method to persist changes to the directory store.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> método para manter as alterações para o repositório de diretório.

trans-unit.source: To refresh the property cache.
trans-unit.target: Para atualizar o cache de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An array of the specified properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz das propriedades especificadas.

trans-unit.source: Loads the values of the specified properties into the property cache.
trans-unit.target: Carrega os valores das propriedades especificadas no cache de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer alterações não confirmadas para o cache de propriedade serão perdidas.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> to persist changes to the directory store.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> para manter as alterações para o repositório de diretório.

trans-unit.source: To refresh the property cache.
trans-unit.target: Para atualizar o cache de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The new name of the entry.
trans-unit.target: O novo nome da entrada.

trans-unit.source: Changes the name of this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Altera o nome deste objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.

trans-unit.source: This will also affect the path that is used to refer to this entry.
trans-unit.target: Isso também afeta o caminho que é usado para se referir a essa entrada.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, be sure to call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method on the new object to make the move permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> é `true`, certifique-se de chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> método no novo objeto para fazer a mudança permanentes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the schema class for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da classe de esquema deste objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the schema class for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O nome da classe de esquema deste objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" />.

trans-unit.source: This is the same as the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Isso é o mesmo que o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object's schema defines its properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> esquema do objeto define suas propriedades e métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> propriedades da <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example gets the user-specified <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> and gets all of its children if the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> is a container object.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo obtém o usuário especificado <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> e obtém todos os seus filhos se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> é um objeto contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> is a container object if the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A> of that object is "container".
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> é um objeto contêiner se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A> desse objeto é "contêiner".

trans-unit.source: To get the schema name.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o nome do esquema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema object for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de esquema para essa entrada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the schema class for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que representa a classe de esquema dessa entrada.

trans-unit.source: An entry's schema determines a list of its mandatory and optional property names.
trans-unit.target: Esquema de uma entrada determina uma lista de seus nomes de propriedade obrigatórios e opcionais.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to find out what properties and methods are available on the associated object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para descobrir quais propriedades e métodos estão disponíveis no objeto associado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> propriedades da <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example gets the user-specified <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object and gets all of its children if the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> object is a container object.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo obtém o usuário especificado <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> de objeto e obtém todos os seus filhos se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> é um objeto recipiente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> is a container object if the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A> of that object is "container".
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> é um objeto contêiner se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A> desse objeto é "contêiner".

trans-unit.source: To get the schema object.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o objeto de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache should be committed after each operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o cache deve ser confirmado após cada operação.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cache should not be committed after each operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o cache não deve ser confirmado após cada operação; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, as alterações nas propriedades são feitas localmente em um cache e valores de propriedade a ser lido são armazenados em cache depois de ler o primeiro.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> property is `true`, access to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object's properties is faster.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> é de propriedade `true`, acesse o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> propriedades do objeto é mais rápido.

trans-unit.source: Setting this to `false` will cause the cache to be committed after each operation.
trans-unit.target: A definição para `false` fará com que o cache seja confirmada depois de cada operação.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> property is `true` and you want to commit cached changes, call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> é de propriedade `true` e deseja fazer alterações de confirmação em cache, chame o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To update values in the cache after changes to the directory are made, call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para atualizar valores em cache depois que forem feitas alterações no diretório, chamar o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> before calling <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Se você chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> antes de chamar <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, quaisquer alterações não confirmadas para o cache de propriedades serão perdidas.

trans-unit.source: The Internet Information Services (IIS) provider does not support committing the cache after each operation.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de serviços de informações da Internet (IIS) não oferece suporte para confirmar o cache depois de cada operação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de usuário que será usado para autenticar o cliente.

trans-unit.source: The user name to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: O nome de usuário a ser usado para autenticar o cliente.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A> in order to specify alternate credentials with which to access the information in Active Directory Domain Services.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A> para especificar credenciais alternativas que acessa as informações nos serviços de domínio do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Any other <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objects retrieved from this instance (for example, through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) are automatically created with the same alternate credentials.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer outro <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objetos recuperados dessa instância (por exemplo, por meio de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) são criados automaticamente com as mesmas credenciais alternativas.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A> properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A> propriedades da <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example gets the user-specified <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> of all its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo obtém o usuário especificado <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path%2A> de todos os seus <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>.
